"It's coming, It's coming." You've been saying that since--

When I've lost my appetite?
Or what kind of rubbish is this?

Ah, ageless mama. See her skin glowing.

This useless one that has bleached her entire life away

[in English] Look at her, always acting like a pussycat.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] This useless thing.

It's not your fault, when lack of problem is your problem.

Yo, dude, your sister is fine.

Whose mum?
Your mum or my mum?
Fine, Kitan.

and the mummy of the whole community!

the celebrant, for a few words.

translation.en: Oh, what can I say?
Thank you very much.
Oh, my God.
Thank you for coming everybody. I--
Yes, as I was saying, thank you so much for coming.

But I know it's not easy to gather people on a Tuesday for a party.

Kemi, take care of my guests.

translation.en: from the most versatile band, in the whole of Africa,
translation.es: de la banda más versátil de toda África,

translation.en: Akin Shuga and the Shuga Band.
translation.es: Akin Shuga y la Shuga Band.

translation.en: I hope you people have not forgotten your promise.
[MC] And I wanna tell you guys, if you're still sitting down...

translation.en: Senator, my mother didn't get where she is today

There's been no official appointment yet, so until then, we wait.
translation.es: Aún no hay un nombramiento oficial,así que hasta entonces, esperamos.

translation.en: That's fine, that's fine.
But I just want to remind you that a deal is a deal

translation.en: and it won't be good if you break it.
translation.es: y no estará bien si lo rompe.

translation.en: Remind?
With all due respect, Senator,
you of all people should know that my mother doesn't take kindly to threats.
translation.es: usted debe saber que mi madre no aceptaamablemente las amenazas.

translation.en: I'd be mindful not to tug the tail of the lion if I were you.

translation.en: We will get to you after the announcement has been made, as promised.

translation.en: So until then, Senator, try to stay out of danger.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, senador,trate de mantenerse fuera de peligro.

translation.en: After all, Lagos can be a very dangerous city,

translation.en: [man whimpering] Boss, please.
Stand him up.
-[whimpering] -Stand up.
[in Yoruba] Look at me.
Look at me!
Have you eaten?
[in English] Nasco, why?
Are we barbarians here?

Please don't be offended.

Sometimes, they don't know how to treat a friend.

Very good.

-[woman] Leave me alone! -[man] I will deal with you!
[woman] You won't even let me feed well.
[woman] Eniola!

[in English] Have you told him about the pregnancy?
Eh?
The boy responsible.
[in Yoruba] Yes, I told him. I went to see him.

He insulted me,
my children and my family.
translation.es: a mis hijos y a mi familia.

after humiliating her.
Please save me.
Mama... are you sure he's the one?
He's the one.
If you want me to swear in my child's name.

translation.en: My child is very naive.
That's why he took advantage of her.

translation.en: He has totally destroyed her life.
translation.es: Le ha destruido la vida totalmente.

translation.en: Take it easy
Mama.

translation.en: -Mama. -[in Yoruba] I'm answering you.
[in English] I have a question for you.
I want you to think carefully before you answer me.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Please explain. Explain in detail.
[in Yoruba] I have question for you.
A week from today...
the young man...
and your child...
do you want them to get married?
Or do you want to hear news of his death?
Which do you prefer?
What did you just say?
[in English] I will not repeat myself.
[in Yoruba] Ah, what a pity.
What a pity. This man disgraced me.
translation.es: Qué lástima. Este hombre me deshonró.

translation.es: ¡Me deshonró y me humilló!Pero no se retractará.

translation.en: [in English] Mama. You have not answered my question.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Is that so?
King...
The deed has been done.
What else?
It's marriage.
-Ade. -Yes, King.
[in English] Take mama outside, get all the information needed.

translation.en: I personally, want you to sort this out immediately.

translation.en: -Yes, King. -Thank you.
Mama, this way.
-No need to thank me. -Thank you.
Mama, no need to thank me.
-Ah, I have to. It is needed. -[Ade] Mama.
I just want to thank you. Thank you.
-Don't worry. -[sighing]
-This way. -See my life. Thank you.
translation.es: - Por aquí.- Veré mi vida. Gracias.

translation.en: Market woman!
I'm answering you, King.
A week from now...
there will be an election.
Your living things...
and the non-living things...
male...
female...
they vote or not... we will win.
translation.es: ya sea que voten o no, ganaremos.

translation.en: King, you can't send a gossip on an errand and she won't deliver.

translation.en: What you just said...
The young, old, male, female...
translation.es: El joven, el viejo, hombre, mujer...

translation.es: De hecho, todo el mercado le pertenece.

translation.en: You are in!
Do we still have people outside?
All the way down the street, mum.
translation.es: A lo largo de la calle, mamá.

translation.en: Are you okay?
I'm tired.
I'm done for the day, baby.
[in Yoruba] Sorry.
Please take money, share it among them for their transportation and food.

translation.en: -Hmm? -Okay. Don't worry, mum. I'll handle it.
translation.es: - ¿Sí?- No te preocupes, mamá. Yo me encargaré.

translation.en: Thank you, baby.
[woman] This is the one I was telling you about, ma.

translation.en: It will make you stand out very well.
It's very pretty. Mummy, see.
Mmm, yes. It's fine, but...
[in Yoruba] It's very expensive.
-Please let me look at something else. -[in Yoruba] Please don't say that.
translation.es: - Déjame mirar otra cosa.- Por favor, no digas eso.

translation.en: You shall eat whatever you desire. You shall drink whatever you desire.
translation.es: Comerán lo que deseen,beberán lo que deseen,

translation.en: You shall wear whatever you desire, by God's grace.
translation.es: usarás lo que desees,por la gracia de Dios.

translation.en: [in English] Just tell God, it is done. Are you the bride?

translation.en: -Yes, ma. -Come here.
You are beautiful.
[in Yoruba] Ma'am! How many times will your daughter have a wedding?
It's just once.
You have to make your in-laws see that your child is as precious as gold
translation.es: Debe hacer que sus suegros veanque su hija es tan valiosa como el oro

translation.en: and she's not ordinary.
Do you understand me?
-I understand but-- -There are no buts!
There are no buts in your life.
translation.es: No hay peros en su vida.

translation.en: Give it to me.
There are no buts in your life. Can you come closer, my darling?
translation.es: No hay peros en su vida.¿Puedes acercarte, cariño?

translation.en: I will show you something.
Just look at this.
[in Yoruba] Ma'am, take a look. Give me your hand.
Feel that. Run it though.
Wow.
Feel that?
Can you feel that? Beautiful.
You see, this was handmade.
Everything you see here was hand-crafted. It is neck breaking labor.
translation.es: Todo lo que ven aquí fue hecho a mano.Es un trabajo muy arduo.

translation.en: I know what we're giving you.
[in Yoruba] May this child benefit from you.
translation.es: Que esta hija se beneficie de ti.

translation.en: [in English] Sweetheart, do you like it?
Yes, ma, it does really make my skin pop.
Oh, my God! Pop!
[in Yoruba] You've got it spot on! Your daughter wants this badly.

translation.en: -You know what is good! -Good afternoon, ma.
translation.es: - Sabes lo que es bueno.- Buenas tardes, ma.

translation.en: Ah. Can you please go into my office?
When I'm done with my customer, I'll meet you in a minute, okay?
translation.es: Cuando termine con mi cliente,te veré en un minuto, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Okay, ma. -Thank you.
[in Yoruba] Ah, thank you, my dear. What were we talking about?
Let me tell you something.
If you have money that covers the entire world
and you don't spend it on your child.
translation.es: y no lo gasta en su hija,

translation.en: It's all a waste.
If we die today, will the money be buried with us?
translation.es: Si morimos hoy,¿enterrarán el dinero con nosotros?

translation.en: Do you see this child?
I'm tapping into your grace.
I have two children. A boy and a girl.
translation.es: Tengo dos hijos: una mujer y un varón.

translation.en: And I am praying for a day like this.
translation.es: Y rezo porque llegue un día así.

translation.en: I am praying for both a son-in-law and a daughter-in-law.
translation.es: Rezo por un yerno y una nuera.

translation.en: So because of that, I will sow into your daughter's wedding.
translation.es: Por eso, la ayudarécon la boda de su hija.

translation.en: -Huh? -Yes.
I know how much I bought this fabric and I know what my profit should be.

translation.en: My profit is 5% and I'll take it off. Just pay the cost price
translation.es: Mi ganancia es del 5 % y me la quito.Solo pague el precio del costo.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you so very much, madam.
You see, I didn't come expecting to spend that much.
[in Yoruba] Ah, what are you talking about?
If that's the situation, I have a POS machine.
translation.es: Si esa es la situación,puede pagar con tarjeta.

translation.en: Bring the machine!
You see, this store is yours.
Come in and take whatever you want. Do you understand?
Now I know you, and we've become family. Do you understand?

translation.en: [in English] Just make her happy. Make her happy, please.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you, Mummy.
Well done, well done.
I pray you enjoy it.
[in Yoruba] God will make it a day of joy for you.

translation.en: Fantastic! Unfortunately, I have to leave you.
I need to attend to the other guest.
Nneka, the shoe and bag, don't forget to show them.

translation.en: Shoe and bag?
-[in Pidgin] Boss, you know what happened? -What happened?
That's what I was expecting from you! You have just been...
translation.es: ¡Es lo que esperaba de usted!Acaba de ser...

translation.en: So, Boss, as I tried to position myself,
Do you understand me?
Oh, God. Bosco, speak.
It hurts that you guys weren't there to see what I did.
translation.es: Qué pena que ustedes no estuvieranallí para ver lo que hice.

translation.en: As soon as I charged...
they just kept looking at me and started bringing out their guns and grenades.

translation.es: Qué lástima, qué lástima, qué lástima.

translation.en: You have taken your finger,
dipped it in hot pepper and poked your mother in the eye with it.
translation.es: lo mojaste en ají picantey se lo clavaste a tu madre en el ojo.

translation.en: My name is Makanaki and I don't have a mother.
translation.es: Me llamo Makanaki y no tengo madre.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Maka, respect the crown. What is wrong with you?
translation.es: Maka, respeta a la corona.¿Qué te pasa?

translation.en: What crown are you talking about?
You all fear a lion that has lost its claws and teeth.
translation.es: Todos le temen a un leónque perdió sus garras y dientes.

translation.en: Old glory, old school.
A mother who can't take care of her children.
translation.es: Una madre que no puede cuidarde a sus hijos.

translation.en: She's making money from politics.
[in English] She has no time for us.
When last has anyone at this table benefited from this woman?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que alguienen esta mesa se benefició de esta mujer?

translation.en: Huh? Answer. Raise hands. Apostle? Huh?
Otunba, sir?
You? But she wants to come back here and share from our hustle again.
translation.es: ¿Tú? Pero quiere volver y compartirde nuevo nuestro trabajo.

translation.en: She wants to be king at this table.
translation.es: Quiere ser la reina en esta mesa.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Mama, your era has passed. Drop the mantle.
translation.es: Madre, tu época ya pasó.Cede el lugar.

translation.en: [in English] Release the crown.
Jesus of Nazareth!
Apostle, that is not from Jesus...
translation.es: Apóstol, eso no es de Jesús...

translation.en: or your king.
It's from Makanaki.
And Odogwu Malay.
-Tell them the facts. -Facts.
Well... [clears throat] Um, what is done is done.
Mummy, we cannot reverse what has been done.
translation.es: Madre, no podemos revertirlo que se ha hecho.

translation.en: But I'm glad that Makanaki respects our rules
translation.es: Pero me alegra que Makanakirespete nuestras reglas

translation.en: enough to make sure the king has her share.
translation.es: lo suficiente como para asegurarde que la reina tenga su parte.

translation.en: No, no. Everybody at this table has an equal share. Who's a king?
translation.es: No, no. Todos en esta mesatienen la misma cuota. ¿Quién es rey?

translation.en: Maki! Her cut is 40, after everything else.
translation.es: ¡Maki! Su parte es de 40,luego de la deducción de todo lo demás.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] She's not my king.
[in English] She's not my king.
[in Yoruba] They say a child doesn't recognize a deadly herb,
translation.es: Dicen que un niño no reconoceuna hierba mortal,

translation.en: so he calls it a vegetable.
The elders spoke that proverb.
Little ones, where were you when I started?
Look at me, Akorede.
[in English] Sitting in this chair as the head of this table...
translation.es: Sentada en esta sillacomo cabeza de esta mesa...

translation.en: It's not by mistake.
Your weak, late uncle,
who you inherited that seat from should have told you.
translation.es: de quien heredaste ese asientodebió decírtelo.

translation.en: No worries.
[in Yoruba] The whip that was used for the first wife
translation.es: El látigo que se usópara la primera esposa

translation.en: is available for the second wife.
translation.es: está disponible para la segunda esposa.

translation.en: It seems that that crown on your head is starting to drive you crazy.
translation.es: Parece que esa corona en la cabezate está volviendo loca.

translation.en: Makanaki, is something wrong with you?
[in English] What sort of insult is that?
If you cannot respect the crown, respect her age.
translation.es: Si no puedes respetar la corona,respeta su edad.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Your blood's too hot. Calm down.
translation.es: Tu sangre está muy caliente. Cálmate.

translation.en: Yorubas say:
[in Yoruba] "May God deliver us from evil."
You thought that prayer was about sickness?
translation.es: ¿Creíste que la oraciónera sobre la enfermedad?

translation.en: Disease? Or death?
That prayer was about me.
I am evil incarnate.
God's worst punishment in a person!
translation.es: ¡El peor castigo de Dios en una persona!

translation.en: -And when I rain... -No, no, no, Eniola, no!
translation.es: - Y cuando dirijo...- ¡No, no, no, Eniola, no!

translation.en: [in Yoruba] They say, one's child cannot be so bad
translation.es: Dicen que el hijo de unono puede ser tan malo

translation.en: that he is offered to the Lion as food.
translation.es: como para ofrecerlo como comida al león.

translation.en: And? You think am afraid of God?
translation.es: ¿Y qué? ¿Crees que le tengo miedo a Dios?

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Keep quiet.
Why do you talk like this? You don't fear God?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hablas así?¿No le temes a Dios?

translation.en: Don't you know that God sees everything that's happening here? You will upset Him.
translation.es: ¿No sabes que Dios ve todolo que está pasando aquí? Lo alterarás.

translation.en: Only God can settle all these problems going on here.
translation.es: Solo Dios puede resolver  estos problemas.

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
That is the problem.
Any small thing: "God, God, God."
You are all afraid of a God you have never seen.
translation.es: Le tienen miedo a un Diosque nunca han visto.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You really should fear me as I sit here, but you don't.
translation.es: Deberían temerme mientrasme siento aquí, pero no lo hacen.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] If only you could see inside me,
translation.es: Si pudieran ver dentro de mí,

translation.en: you would know how dark my heart is.
translation.es: sabrían lo oscuro que es mi corazón.

translation.en: -Akorede. -Hmm?
-You want my crown? -Yes.
Stand up. Come and collect it.
[in Yoruba] You'll realize that the teeth a dog uses to play with her puppies
translation.es: Te darás cuenta de que los dientesde un perro para jugar con sus cachorros

translation.en: are the same teeth she uses to discipline them.
translation.es: son los mismos dientesque usa para disciplinarlos.

translation.en: Mama, you like to speak in parables? Let me give you one.
translation.es: Madre, ¿te gusta hablar en parábolas?Déjame darte una.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] A tree that cannot support us when we rest on it
translation.es: Un árbol que no puede sostenernoscuando nos apoyamos en él

translation.en: cannot kill us if it falls on us.
translation.es: no puede matarnos si cae sobre nosotros.

translation.en: Korede, stop there!
Look at me.
[in English] I swear, in front of everybody here today,
translation.es: Lo juro, frente a todos aquí hoy,

translation.en: including the man of God...
that I, Eniola Salami,
will stretch my hands over your dead body.
translation.es: extenderé las manos sobre tu cadáver.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] It's Makanaki! My name is Makanaki.
-Mr. Apata. -Mr. Gobir.
Yes, good day.
Yes, any new offers on the house yet?
Mr. Gobir, these things don't happen overnight.
translation.es: Señor Gobir, estas cosasno suceden de la noche a la mañana.

translation.en: You gave us strict instructions,
unless you'd like us to entertain offers below your asking price.
translation.es: a menos que quiera que aceptemos ofertaspor debajo de su precio.

translation.en: That's okay.
Give it some more time. Mr. Apata, I'll call you back.
translation.es: Dele más tiempo.Señor Apata, lo llamaré.

translation.en: Hi.
It's okay, they are fine.
They are with my sister. You need to rest now.
translation.es: Están con mi hermana.Ahora debes descansar.

translation.en: ♪ Come and be victorious Lord Jesus Christ ♪
♪ For your servants ♪
♪ In the midst of all our enemies ♪
translation.es: En medio de todos nuestros enemigos

translation.en: ♪ Father, come and be victorious ♪
♪ Come and be victorious Lord Jesus Christ ♪
♪ For your servants ♪
♪ In the midst of all our enemies ♪
translation.es: En medio de todos nuestros enemigos

translation.en: ♪ Father, come and be victorious ♪
♪ The father is victorious ♪
♪ The son is victorious ♪
♪ The Holy Spirit is victorious ♪
You accepted the sacrifice of Olugbon and he became victorious.
translation.es: Aceptaste el sacrificio de Olugbony él salió victorioso.

translation.en: You accepted the sacrifice of Aresha and he also became successful.
translation.es: Aceptaste el sacrificio de Areshay también tuvo éxito.

translation.en: You are the one that accepted the sacrifice of Onikoyi.
translation.es: Tú aceptaste el sacrificio de Onikoyi.

translation.en: That is how Onikoyi became a powerful person.
translation.es: Así es como Onikoyise volvió una persona poderosa.

translation.en: We reverence you, Great Mother!
Akorede, oh!
Korede, oh!
You have no understanding! You have no understanding, Akorede!
It is said that the flood is always determined to wash away the house,
translation.es: Dicen que la inundación siemprearrasará una casa,

translation.en: but the owner must be ready to prevent it. That is so!
translation.es: pero el dueño debe estar listopara evitarla. ¡Eso es!

translation.en: A dog that challenges a lion is definitely ready to die.
translation.es: Un perro que desafía a un leóndefinitivamente está listo para morir.

translation.en: That is so!
A butterfly that challenges a thorn head-on
translation.es: Una mariposa que desafíaa una espina de frente

translation.en: will surely have wings and beauty torn to shreds.
translation.es: seguramente tendrá sus alas y su belleza hechas trizas.

translation.en: Open your mouth and say exactly what you want here today.
translation.es: Abre la boca y di lo que quieras hoy.

translation.en: The crown is the identity of a king.
translation.es: La corona es la identidad de un rey.

translation.en: Beads are the identity of a chief.
translation.es: Las cuentas son la identidad de un jefe.

translation.en: I want the crown on Eniola's head.
-Give me the crown! -Korede, oh!
-Give me the crown! -Korede, oh!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back.
translation.es: - ¡Dame la corona!- Abriré un camino con tu espalda.

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -I will drag you through the bushes!
translation.es: - ¡Dame la corona!- ¡Te arrastraré entre los arbustos!

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -I will drag you through the bushes.
translation.es: - ¡Dame la corona!- Te arrastraré entre los arbustos.

translation.en: Give me the crown!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back.
translation.es: - ¡Dame la corona!- Abriré un camino con tu espalda.

translation.en: -Give me the crown! -Akorede oh!
-Give me the crown! -I will clear a path with your back!
translation.es: - ¡Dame la corona!- ¡Abriré un camino con tu espalda!

translation.en: [scoffs] Ah, sir.
With all these?
Murder, election manipulation, money laundering?
Very. But nothing has been able to stick until now.
translation.es: Así es. Pero nada se ha podido demostrarhasta ahora.

translation.en: Look, this woman is as slippery as an eel. Too many government connects.
translation.es: Esta mujer es escurridiza como una anguila.Tiene demasiados contactos en el gobierno.

translation.en: But I know how to get her. Look at the finances.
translation.es: Pero sé cómo atraparla.Mira las finanzas.

translation.en: Ah, ah, ah, ah...
All these verified, sir?
Look, she's been laundering a lot of money through these businesses.
translation.es: Mira, ha estado lavando mucho dineroen estos negocios.

translation.en: We received a reliable tip
that she is the mastermind
translation.es: de que ella es la autora intelectual

translation.en: behind the string of recent political robberies.
translation.es: detrás de los recientes robos políticos.

translation.en: Her targets can't go to the police and report
translation.es: Sus objetivos no puedenir a la policía e informarlos,

translation.en: because these are stolen funds.
So she is making out like a bandit.
translation.es: Así que lo está logrando como una bandida.

translation.en: But, sir, these people. Aren't they her political cronies?
translation.es: Pero, señor, esta gente.¿No son sus compinches políticos?

translation.en: [in Hausa] Yeah, No honor amongst thieves, I guess.
translation.es: Sí, no hay honor entre los ladrones,supongo.

translation.en: You are right.
Look, I want you on this immediately.
translation.es: Mira, te quiero en esto de inmediato.

translation.en: But, sir, we are still on the Ebele case and--
translation.es: Pero seguimos en el caso Ebele y...

translation.en: I know, but this has been pushed up by the powers above.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero esto fue impulsadopor los poderes de arriba.

translation.en: We must get her immediately.
[in Hausa] Got it?
Yes, sir.
Uh, Gobir.
-Yes, sir. -I want you to be careful.
translation.es: - Sí, señor.- Quiero que tengas cuidado.

translation.en: [in Hausa] She is a terrible person.
She can be very dangerous.
[Gobir] How dangerous can she be?
[Eniola in Yoruba] God, I'm begging you.
Don't bring tears to my eyes and pain to my body.
translation.es: No le traigas lágrimas a los ojosy dolor a mi cuerpo.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Kitan, what is it? What have I done to you, this child?
translation.es: Kitan, ¿qué pasa?¿Qué te he hecho, hija?

translation.en: Where do I turn to? Where do I turn to?
translation.es: ¿A quién me dirijo? ¿A quién me dirijo?

translation.en: Mum, please, can you sit down?
Your constant pacing will drill a hole in this floor.
translation.es: Tu paso constantehará un agujero en el piso.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Leave me alone! What is wrong with you?
Stop it!
All I'm saying is calm down or you'll give yourself high blood pressure.
translation.es: Solo digo que te calmeso tendrás presión alta.

translation.en: -High blood pressure? -He's fine.
I've told you that he and Tiger are on the way back.
translation.es: Te dije que él y Tiger están de regreso.

translation.en: Right. Thank you!
[in Yoruba] Thank you, God. I will worship you.
Thank you, creator of heaven and earth.
translation.es: Gracias, creador del cielo y la Tierra.

translation.en: Kitan, my dear, what's wrong with you?
Look at my life!
Kitan, a worried parent will always say to the child, "Child, don't kill me."
translation.es: Kitan, un padre preocupado siempredirá "Niño, no me mates".

translation.en: -"Child, don't kill me." -Mummy.
But you'll push me to the point where I say, "Child, don't kill yourself."
translation.es: Pero me empujarás al puntoen que diga "Niño, no te mates".

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
Mummy, you don't know what I went through.
translation.es: Mamá, no sabes lo que pasé.

translation.en: Do you ever think of your family before you do the stupid things you do?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez pensaste en tu famliaantes de hacer las estupideces que haces?

translation.en: [Kitan] Mum, please. I'm not in the mood for this girl right now.
translation.es: Mamá, por favor. No estoy de humorpara esta chica ahora.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] You must have hit your head on the steering wheel in that car crash.
translation.es: Debes haberte golpeado la cabezacon el volante en el accidente.

translation.en: You're not in the mood?
But you were in the mood to drive piss drunk and total an entire car?
translation.es: ¿Pero estabas de humor para conducirebrio y destruir un auto entero?

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Kemi, please. -What if you killed someone?
translation.es: - Kemi, por favor.- ¿Y si mataste a alguien?

translation.en: -That's enough. -Eh?
I'm tired of this girl. Stupid bitch.
translation.es: Estoy cansado de esta chica.Perra estúpida.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Who is a bitch? You must be stupid. You?
translation.es: ¿Quién es esa perra?Debes de ser tonto. ¿Tú?

translation.en: -My life! -Mummy!
In my presence!
Do I look like a bag of salt? Right in my presence!
translation.es: ¿Parezco una bolsa de sal?¡Justo en mi presencia!

translation.en: Calling your older sister what?
translation.es: ¿Llamar a tu hermana mayor de qué?

translation.en: You are hitting me because of her? Because of this one?
"Because of her?"
Who do you think bailed you out and kept your stupidity out of the press?
translation.es: ¿Quién crees que pagó tu fianzay mantuvo tu estupidez lejos de la prensa?

translation.en: -Do your job! Do your job. -Do my job?
translation.es: - ¡Haz tu trabajo! Haz tu trabajo.- ¿Hacer mi trabajo?

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] That's enough. -You know what? I blame you.
-Me? -You baby him and you spoil him
and that's why he walks around with this stupid sense of entitlement!
translation.es: y por eso caminacon ese estúpido sentido de derecho!

translation.en: That's enough, please.
-Entitlement? -Yes!
If anybody should be entitled here...
-Stop! -...who should be entitled? You.
-Kitan! -At least I am not actively trying
translation.es: ¡Kitan! ¡Al menos no trato de avergonzara la familia!

translation.en: to bring shame onto this family!
translation.es: ¡Al menos no trato de avergonzara la familia!

translation.en: Kemi. That's enough, please.
I am tired of letting him get away with everything because "KT is sensitive."
translation.es: Estoy cansada de dejar que se salgacon la suya porque "KT es sensible".

translation.en: Don't say that.
He does absolutely nothing but spend money all day!
translation.es: No hace más que gastar dinero todo el día.

translation.en: Adds nothing to this family!
translation.es: ¡No le agrega nada a esta familia!

translation.en: And after almost ruining his life in England,
translation.es: Y después de casi arruinarsu vida en Inglaterra,

translation.en: he comes back here to pick up where he left off!
translation.es: ¡regresa aquí para retomar lo que dejó!

translation.en: -He'll never change! -That's enough!
Mummy, I'm doing my best to be calm. Am I not your son?
translation.es: Mamá, estoy haciendo todo lo posiblepara estar tranquilo. ¿No soy tu hijo?

translation.en: Should she be talking to me like this? Am I not your son? That's enough!
-Wait. -Son? Kitan...
I am more of a son than you will ever be.
translation.es: Soy más un hijo de lo que tú serás.

translation.en: -Don't say that! -What do you want to do?
-Stop! -What?
[in Yoruba] Don't ever say that! It's enough! Don't ever say that!
translation.es: No digas eso jamás.Fue suficiente. No digas eso jamás.

translation.en: What is the matter with you? Don't ever repeat that in this house!
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa?¡No repitas nunca más eso en esta casa!

translation.en: -I blame you. -Blame me for what?
-I blame you. -You cannot blame me!
translation.es: - Es tu culpa.- No puedes culparme.

translation.en: You are to blame for everything. You treat him like a two-year-old.
translation.es: Tú tienes la culpa de todo.Lo tratas como a un niño de dos años.

translation.en: Look, I remember how you helped my son
translation.es: Mira, recuerdo cómo ayudaste a mi hijo

translation.en: with that unfortunate incident,
so I agreed to this meeting out of respect.
translation.es: así que acepté esta reunión por respeto.

translation.en: But honestly, I do not know how I can be of help.
translation.es: Pero honestamente, no sécómo puedo ser de ayuda.

translation.en: That's the problem.
Because everyone seems to have forgotten all the good things I have done for them.
translation.es: Porque todos parecen haberse olvidadotodo lo bueno que hice por ellos.

translation.en: See, that is the kind of talk that has landed you where you are now, Eniola.
translation.es: Ese es el tipo de charla que te ha llevadoa donde estás ahora, Eniola.

translation.en: What kind of talk, Senator Okon? What kind of talk?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de charla, senador Okon?¿Qué clase de charla?

translation.en: Huh? Because I insisted on what was promised to me?
[Okon] Yes.
See, I don't know how this works where you come from.
translation.es: No sé cómo funciona esto de dónde vienes.

translation.en: But, Eniola, you have played politics long enough to know
translation.es: Pero, Eniola, has jugado a la políticalo suficiente como para saber

translation.en: that there are no certainties in this game.
translation.es: que no hay certezas en este juego.

translation.en: And these threats and raids--
I had nothing to do with this. Absolutely nothing.
translation.es: No tuve nada que ver con esto.Absolutamente nada.

translation.en: As far as everyone is concerned, you have drawn the battle line.
translation.es: En lo que a todos respecta,has puesto en orden una línea de batalla.

translation.en: You have made yourself a liability.
A dangerous one.
Number One is far from happy.
translation.es: El número uno no está para nada feliz.

translation.en: I tried calling him.
I tried calling him to explain things to him.
translation.es: Intenté llamarlo para explicarle las cosas.

translation.en: He is not taking my calls. Nobody is taking my calls.
translation.es: No contesta mis llamadas.Nadie contesta mis llamadas.

translation.en: Everyone shut me out completely, despite everything I've done for them.
translation.es: Todos me excluyeron por completo,a pesar de todo lo que hice por ellos.

translation.en: Of course! You have stepped on the tail of the tiger.
translation.es: ¡Claro! Le has pisado la cola al tigre.

translation.en: And I'm afraid what he might do.
translation.es: Y tengo miedo de lo que pueda hacer.

translation.en: I need to see him.
Can you arrange a meeting?
Eniola, I could be in trouble just being seen with you.
translation.es: Eniola, podría estar en problemassolo de verme contigo.

translation.en: Not to mention telling you all this.
translation.es: Por no hablar de todo esto.

translation.en: I have to go.
Good luck.
Where are they?
Open the gate for them!
Come on, open the gate! We have nothing to hide!
translation.es: Vamos, abran el portón.No tenemos nada que esconder.

translation.en: -Good morning, madam. -Yes?
I can't read it.
It's an official letter inviting you in, ma.
translation.es: Es una carta oficial de invitación, madre.

translation.en: [chuckling] Inviting me? What's going on? You're throwing a party?
-For questioning, madam. -Today?
Right now.
Questioning for what?
You will find out when you get to the office.
translation.es: Lo sabrá cuando llegue a la oficina.

translation.en: Don't worry.
Give me few minutes to change and I'll be with you.
translation.es: Dame unos minutos para cambiarmey estaré contigo.

translation.en: -That's fine. -Just stay there please. There.
translation.es: - Está bien.- Quédate ahí, por favor. Ahí.

translation.en: Mum, let's just go, please. You want to change, let's change.
translation.es: Mamá, vámonos, por favor.Si quieres cambiarte, vamos a cambiarte.

translation.en: [Gobir] Good morning, Mrs. Salami. Pleasure to finally meet you.
translation.es: Buenos días, señora Salami.Es un placer conocerla.

translation.en: The pleasure is all mine.
My daughter.
Kemi Salami. I'll be acting as her legal counsel.
translation.es: Kemi Salami.Actuaré como su asesora legal.

translation.en: Congratulations on your new appointment.
Although the man before you happens to be my very good friend.
translation.es: Aunque el hombre predecesores un muy buen amigo.

translation.en: I'm sure you are going to do great in this new appointment of yours.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que lo hará muy bienen este nuevo cargo.

translation.en: Of course, Mrs. Salami. Thank you.
You're welcome.
Well, I would not like to insult you by beating around the bush.
translation.es: No me gustaría insultarlapor andar con rodeos.

translation.en: Do you mind if we go straight to the point?
translation.es: ¿Le importa si vamos directo al grano?

translation.en: -Oh, please. -Great.
Well, first of all I must thank you for coming on such short notice.
translation.es: En primer lugar, debo agradecerlepor venir con tan poca anticipación.

translation.en: Well, she didn't have a choice.
Your men barricaded our house like she was a criminal.
translation.es: Sus hombres atrincheraron nuestra casacomo si fuera una criminal.

translation.en: Sorry to hear that.
I must speak to my people on better procedure next time.
translation.es: Debo hablar con mi gente sobreun mejor procedimiento la próxima vez.

translation.en: Mr. Gobir, you invited me, and here I am.
translation.es: Señor Gobir, me invitó, y aquí estoy.

translation.en: I have nothing to hide.
Well, we are working on a tip from a very reliable source,
translation.es: Bueno, estamos trabajandoen un dato de una fuente muy confiable

translation.en: that you are involved in, uh...
Yes. Money laundering, drug and weapon smuggling.
translation.es: en lavado de dinero,contrabando de drogas y armas.

translation.en: Surely, you did not bring my mother here on hearsay.
translation.es: Seguramente no trajoa mi madre aquí solo por rumores.

translation.en: And who is this "reliable source" feeding you these tips?
translation.es: ¿Y quién es esta "fuente confiable"que le da estos datos?

translation.en: Ms. Salami, with all due respect, you know I cannot tell you that.
translation.es: Señorita Salami, con todo respeto,usted sabe que no puedo decírselo.

translation.en: Well, those tips are simply unfounded.
My mother is a very hardworking woman
translation.es: Mi madre es una mujer muy trabajadora

translation.en: with multiple legitimate businesses to her name.
translation.es: con múltiples negocios legítimosa su nombre.

translation.en: Does she look like someone that smuggles drugs or weapons?
translation.es: ¿Se ve como alguienque trafica drogas o armas?

yet...

unspeakable things in life.
